Welcome to PRTP’s documentation!¶

The Python Raytrace Package (PRTP) is a package of Python functions that simulate X-Ray instruments. It was designed for the McEntaffer Group at the Pennsylvania State University. PRTP expands on the functionality of PyXFocus, but with a more intuitive, modular design.
